title: Bobby Gives Scholarship To Students From His High School + Bobby’s Mailbag: Mom’s Son Wants To Quit School To Become YouTuber + Songs That Make Us Happy
itunes:title: Bobby Gives Scholarship To Students From His High School + Bobby’s Mailbag: Mom’s Son Wants To Quit School To Become YouTuber + Songs That Make Us Happy
description:
Bobby talks with the finalists for his “Don’t Be Skippin’ Class’ scholarship. They each get 15 secs to pitch themselves for a chance to be the winner before he makes his pick. Bobby helps out a mom whose son wants to drop out of school to become a YouTuber. Plus, a study released a list of songs proven to make you happy so we each share our own happy songs!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
